titleInfo.title: Relive the Music and Memories with Opry Country Classics

mods.abstract: Three color window card (red, blue and yellow on white) announcing Relive the Music and Memories at the Grand Ole Opry House in 2009. This poster was reprinted in 2010. Posters printed after the original edition are known as "restrikes."

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
